text: Profilage is a French crime drama TV series. It was developed in 2009 by Fanny Robert and Sophie Lebarbier along with TF1. == Background == The series focuses on Chloé Saint-Laurent (Odile Vuillemin), a criminologist who works at police department in Paris. To solve crimes she uses her own experiences and intelligence. == Cast == Caption Main character Supporting character (two or plus episodes) Guest artist Actor/Actress Character Season 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 Psycho-criminologists Odile Vuillemin Chloé Saint Laurent Juliette Roudet Adèle Delettre Commandants Guillaume Cramoisan Commandant Mathieu Perac Philippe Bas Commandant Thomas Rocher Lieutenants Raphaël Ferret Lieutenant Hippolyte de Courtène Vanessa Valence Lieutenant Fred Kancel Sophie de Fürst Lieutenant Emma Tomasi Commissar Jean-Michel Martial Commissar Grégoire Lamarck Others members of DPJ (Judicial Police) Benjamin Baroche Commandant Antoine Garel Julia Piaton Diane Dassigny Jessica Kancel Josée Drevon Viviane Mercadet Forensic Didier Ferrari Le doc Guillaume de Tonquédec Le doc Valérie Dashwood Bérénice Thomas Rocher's relatives Nathan Georgelin Lucas Rocher Chloé Saint-Laurent's relatives Marie Kremer Louise Drancourt Laurence Masliah Laurence Fisher Fanie Zanini Lili Merrick Matthieu Pérac's relatives Laurence Cormerais Delphine Pérac Others characters Laurent Hennequin Juge Alexandre Hoffman Ron Reznik Vincent Delahaye == Other websites== * Profilage's website on TF1 * Category:2000s French television series Category:Police television series Category:2009 establishments in France
title: Profilage
